entity.description: a physical or virtual location where physical, postal, or virtual contact can be made.

explicit_attr.description: the number of a building in a street.
the number of a postal box.
the name of an area composed of towns.
the code that is used by the country's postal service.
an organization-defined address for internal mail delivery.
the number at which facsimiles may be received.
the number at which telephone calls may be received.
the electronic address at which electronic mail may be received.
the number at which telex messages may be received.

domain_rule.description: At least one of the attributes shall have a value.
domain_rule.label: WR1
domain_rule.expression: EXISTS (street_number) OR EXISTS (street) OR EXISTS (postal_box) OR EXISTS (town) OR EXISTS (region) OR EXISTS (postal_code) OR EXISTS (country) OR EXISTS (internal_location) OR EXISTS (facsimile_number) OR EXISTS (telephone_number) OR EXISTS (electronic_mail_address) OR EXISTS (telex_number)
